project_abstract.cdata: The principal objectives of the Southwest Poverty Reduction Project are to: 1) demonstrate the effectiveness of a focused, multisectoral rural development project approach to poverty reduction; 2) facilitate a "market-friendly" increase in labor mobility from the poor areas to better-off rural and rapidly growing urban areas; 3) upgrade poverty monitoring at the national and local levels; and 4) significantly reduce absolute poverty in 35 of the very poorest counties in southwestern China. The project will comprise the following six components: 1) social services, including increasing the access and quality of primary education and enhancing the availability and delivery of primary and curative health care; 2) labor mobility, through a voluntary system of enhanced rural labor mobility for the upland absolute poor; 3) rural infrastructure, including the labor-intensive construction of rural roads, safe drinking water supply systems, small-scale irrigation, agricultural drainage works, biogas digesters, and rural electrification; 4) land and farmer development, using menus of crop and livestock activities to increase upland agricultural productivity and reverse the trend of environmental degradation; 5) Township and Village Enterprise (TVE) development, through support for TVEs consisting of investment credit for labor-intensive, mineral, service and handicraft industries; and 6) institution building and poverty monitoring.

P003639.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>西南扶贫项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的主要目标是：（1）对有针对性、涉及多个部门的通过农村发展项目开展扶贫这一方式的效果进行示范；（2）促进贫困地区劳动力按照市场规律更多地向条件较好的农村地区和迅速发展的城市地区流动；（3）加大中央和地方贫困监测力度；（4）大幅减少中国西南地区最贫困县中35县的绝对贫困人口。本项目设有六个子项目：（1）社会服务子项目，包括提高初等教育可及性和质量，增基本保健和医疗服务的可获得性和提供；（2）劳动力流动子项目，促进高地绝对贫困地区农村劳动力自愿流动；（3）农村基础设施子项目，包括劳动密集型农村公路建设、安全饮用水供水系统、小型灌溉工程、农田排水工程、沼气池和农村电气化；（4）土地开发和农户发展子项目，采用农作物和畜牧生产活动，提高高地农业生产率，扭转环境退化趋势；（5）乡镇企业发展子项目。提供投资信贷，用于发展劳动密集型矿业、服务业和手工业，支持乡镇企业发展；（6）制度建设和贫困监测。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
